scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && npm run build -w @neighbourhoods/nh-launcher-applet && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "cd ui/app && npm start" "npm run launch:happ"
scripts.launch:happ: RUST_LOG=warn WASM_LOG=debug echo "pass" | hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS ./workdir/we.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network mdns
scripts.start:happ: RUST_LOG=warn WASM_LOG=debug echo "pass" | hc s --piped -f=$ADMIN_PORT generate ./workdir/we.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a we  --ui-port $UI_PORT network mdns
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package -w nh-launcher && hc web-app pack workdir
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dnas && hc app pack ./workdir
scripts.build:dnas: npm run build:zomes && hc dna pack ./dnas/we/workdir && hc dna pack ./dnas/lobby/workdir
scripts.test: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir && cd tests && npm t
